summary: Chain texture I used on my Altmer\'s armor.
descriptionHtml:
Someone asked me to upload these textures, so here they are for everyone to use.

The three High Elf pictures are just an example on how they can be used. It\'s how I used them myself.

[heading][color=yellow]It includes[/color][/heading]
black.DDS
grey.DDS
mail_n.DDS
mail_s.DDS


[heading][color=yellow]Origin[/color][/heading]
It\'s created from an export from Blender and as such I really don\'t mind what anyone does with it as long as proper credits are given when used, edited and uploaded anywhere.
author: ErikRedbeard
